desc: Home of contemporary designer lighting in Sydney & Melbourne. Mondoluce offers a premium collection of light fittings from Italy and beyond, including Vistosi, NEMO Lighting, Axolight, Rotaliana, David Trubridge and more.

layout.text: Zoe Max is one of the largest lamps made by Cangini e Tucci, requiring hours of careful labour performed by skilled glassblowers.
